name: Escape from the Bank
description:
It is an endless maze escaper game. You, and your coin buddies try to escape from the mazes under the Bank. Good Luck!

Move: WASD or Arrows

Find the hole in one of the edges. 

known issue: sometimes it generates a maze that is unfinishable. :( 

2019.05.02. UPDATE: I fixed the unfisihable maze issue. Every part of the maze is reachable now. I leave the original submission here, for the jam.
